Identity theft: Alleged prolific Auckland fraudster faces dozens of charges https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/indentity-theft-alleged-prolific-auckland-fraudster-fraudster-face-dozens-dozens-dozens-farges/x6lqyg4pnze2bipjttpxizcajy/ https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/indentity-theft-alleged-prolific-auckland-fraudster-fraudster-face-dozens-dozens-dozens-farges/x6lqyg4pnze2bipjttpxizcajy/ Police have laid 36 charges and a man has appeared in court. Wed, 09 Apr 2025 04:09:59 +0000 A prolific fraudster faces dozens of charges after allegedly racking up over $100,000 in trade debt under someone else’s identity. Photo / 123rf

Wed, 09 Apr 2025 04:04:54 +0000 Police have referred four students to Youth Aid after two incidents at Kerikeri High School last week. Photo / File
Horsham Downs crash: Police seek witnesses after victim dies from injuries https://www.nzherald.co.nz/waikato-news/news/horsham-downs-crash-crash-police-seek-witness--fter-after-victim-victim-dies-from-injuries/r4m74m74yndafeenepkdn5wri5dhy/ https://www.nzherald.co.nz/waikato-news/news/horsham-downs-crash-crash-police-seek-witness--fter-after-victim-victim-dies-from-injuries/r4m74m74yndafeenepkdn5wri5dhy/ Maryana GarciaThe crash happened just before 7.20pm on Friday, March 28. Wed, 09 Apr 2025 04:00:05 +0000 Police want to speak to the driver of this vehicle - they hope the driver can help with information about a Horsham Downs crash on March 28.
Māori wards under scrutiny with 2025 binding polls looming https://www.nzherald.co.nz/rotorua-daily-post/news/maori-wards-under-scrutiny-with-2025-binding-polls-polls-looming/tvwgakf2p5dtzasnabz3rua4ge/ https://www.nzherald.co.nz/rotorua-daily-post/news/maori-wards-under-scrutiny-with-2025-binding-polls-polls-looming/tvwgakf2p5dtzasnabz3rua4ge/ Forty-two councils will hold a poll for Māori wards in 2025 elections. Wed, 09 Apr 2025 04:00:00 +0000 Toni Boynton represents the Whakatāne District Council’s Kāpū-te-rangi Māori ward. Photo / Alex Cairns
Green Party MP Benjamin Doyle admits political naivety in refusing to delete social media posts https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/politics/green-party-party-mp-benjamin-doyle-speaks-to-media-following-following-following-to-parliament/llawukw3tntndmhovrtmhovrtjd5m3ezf4/ https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/politics/green-party-party-mp-benjamin-doyle-speaks-to-media-following-following-following-to-parliament/llawukw3tntndmhovrtmhovrtjd5m3ezf4/ Jamie EnsorThey have been away following death threats. Wed, 09 Apr 2025 03:47:31 +0000 Green Party MP Benjamin Doyle is taking aim at the “poisonous transphobic hate” they faced over social media posts and admits they were politically naive in not deleting them when told to do so by the party. Photo / Mark Mitchell
Wellington homicide: Man appears in court charged with murder of Simon Bird https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/wellington-homicide-man-man-appears-in-court-court--chard-with-with-murder-simon-bird/5tqwlgzyozenzcj5xu5xu544a2tcty/ https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/wellington-homicide-man-man-appears-in-court-court--chard-with-with-murder-simon-bird/5tqwlgzyozenzcj5xu5xu544a2tcty/ Catherine HuttonThe 23-year-old man has been granted interim name suppression. Wed, 09 Apr 2025 03:30:48 +0000 Simon Bird was found dead on the road in the Wellington suburb of Northland last week. Today, a man appeared in the Wellington District Court charged with his murder.
